Translations.Text: adu (avara sikse) kevala ondu bhikara birugaliyagittu. Astakke avaru ari hodaru
estondu socaniyavagide, dasara sthiti! Avara balige banda yava dutanannu avaru geli madade bittaddilla
avarenu nodillave, avariginta hinde adestu nadugalannu navu nasagolisi bittiddevendu? Avarendu avara balige marali baralararu
avarallina pratiyobbarannu nam'ma bali ottagi hajarupadisalaguvudu
nirjiva bhumiyu avara palige puraveyagide. Navu adannu jivantagolisidevu hagu adarinda dhan'yagalannu utpadisidevu. Avugalanne avaru tinnuttare
mattu navu adaralli kharjurada hagu draksiya totagalannu belesidevu mattu adaralli nadigalannu harisidevu
avaru adara phalagalannu unnalendu (navu idannella madiruvevu). Idavudannu avara kaigalu nirmisilla. Istagiyu avarenu krtajnate sallisuvudillave
Bhumiyu beleyuva ella vastugalannu, svatah avarannu, avarige tilidillada (halavu) jivigalannu – ellavannu jodigalagi srstisidavanu (allahanu), pavananu
ratriyu avara palige puraveyagide. Navu adarinda hagalannu ilisibittaga, avaru kattalannu padeyuttare
mattu suryanu, tanage nigadi padisalagiruva dariyalli calisuttiruttane. Idu a pracanda, sarvajnanu (allahanu) sthapisiruva vyavasthe
innu candranige navu kelavu hantagalannu nigadi padisiruvevu. Estendare adu (balacandra) kharjurada haleya gellinantagi biduttade
candranannu hidiyalu suryanige sadhyavilla, hagalannu miri baralu ratrigu sadhyavilla. Ellavu ondu vrttadalli calisuttive
navu avara santatiyannu tumbida hadagige hattisiddu, avara palige puraveyagide
mattu navu avarigagi, avaru savari maduva innu halavu vastugalannu srstisiruvudu (puraveyagide)
navu bayasiddare avarannu mulugisi bidabahudu. Aga avara more keluvavaru yaru iralararu mattu avaru raksane padeyalararu
adare, kevala ondu nirdista kaladavarege avaru nam'ma anugrahada phalanubhavigalagiruttare
nivu (allahana) krpege patraragalu, nim'ma mundina hagu nim'ma hindina (karmagala) kuritu eccaravagiri endu avarodane helidagalella
mattu tam'ma odeyana puravegala paiki yavude purave avara balige bandagalella, avaru adannu kadeganisiddare

allahanu nimagenannu nidiruvano adarinda, (satkaryakke) kharcu madiri endu tam'modane helidagalella (avaru kadeganisiddare). Dhikkarigalu, visvasigalodane heluttare: Allahanu icchisiddare svatah avane yarige unisi biduttiddano, anthavanigenu navu unisabeke? Nivantu spastavagi darigetta sthitiyalliddiri
Mattu avaru, nivu satyavantaragiddare, a vagdana (punarut'thana) ideruvudu yavaga (embudannu tilisi)? Endu keluttare
nijavagi avaru yavudakkagi kayuttiruvaro adu hathattane banderaguva ondu sidilu matravagiruvudu – avaru jagaladuttiruvagale adu avarannu hididukolluvudu
uyilannu upadesisalikkagali, tam'ma maneyavara balige marali hogalikkagali avarige sadhyavagadu
mattu (innom'me) kahaleyannu udaladaga avarellaru gorigalinda hathattane eddu tam'ma odeyanedege dhavisuvaru
avaru heluvaru: Ayyo nam'ma dusthiti! Nam'mannu nam'ma gorigalinda ebbisidavaru yaru? Nijavagi, a parama dayamayanu vagdana madiddu idanne. Devadutaru satyavanne heliddaru
adu kevala ondu sidilagiruvudu. Astaralle avarellarannu nam'ma munde hajaru padisalaguvudu
indu yara melu kincittu an'yayavagadu mattu nimage, nivu maduttidda karmagala pratiphalada horatu berenu sigadu
svargavasigalu andu khandita mojinalli nirataragiruvaru
avaru mattavara jivana sangatigalu neralugalalli sukhavagi oragi kondiruvaru
alli avarigagi vividha bageya hannu hampalugaliruvavu mattu avaru apeksisiddellavu avarige siguvudu
salam (santi) emba, karunalu odeyana matu (alli molaguttiruvudu)
aparadhigale, indu nivu pratyekavagiri
adamara santatigale, nanu nimage adesisiralillave, nivu saitanana aradhakaragabedi, avanu khandita nim'ma spasta satruvagiddanendu
mattu nivu nannobbananne aradhisabeku, aduve nera margavendu
avanu nim'malli bahu mandiyannu darigedisiddane. Nivenu bud'dhiyannu balasiralillave
iduve nimage vagdana madalagidda naraka
nivu (satyavannu) dhikkarisiddara pratiphalavagi indu idarolage pravesisiri
Indu navu avara (dhikkarigala) bayigalige mudre jadidiruvevu. Nam'modane avara kaigalu matanaduvavu mattu avaru enella madiddarendu avara kalugalu saksi heluvavu
navu bayasidare avara kannugalannu nuccu nurugolisi bidaballevu. A balika avaru dariyedege dhavisali. Avaru enannu tane kanaballaru
navu bayasidare, avaru iruvalle avara rupagalannu vikrtagolisi bidaballevu – a balika avarige munde hogalikku sadhyavagadu, maralalikku agadu
navu yarige dhirgha ayusyavannu koduttevo, avarannu racaneyalli (durbala sthitige) maralisi bidutteve. Avarenu buddiyannu balasuvudillave
navu avarige (dutarige) kavyavannu kalisilla. Adu avarige bhusanavu alla. Idu kevala ondu upadesavagide mattu spastavada kur‌an agide
jivantaviruva ellarannu avaru (dutaru) eccarisabekendu hagu dhikkarigala virud'dha saksavu purtiyagalendu (navu idannu kalisiruvevu)
avaru noduttillave, avaru malakaragiruva januvarugalannu navu avarigagi nam'ma kaiyare srstisiruvevu
navu avugalannu avarige vidheyagolisiruvevu. Avaru a paiki kelavannu savarigagi balasidare, kelavannu aharavagi balasuttare
avugalalli avarige halavu labhagalive, kudiyuva vastugalu ive. Istiddu avaru krtajnate toruvudillave
avaru allahana horatu itararinda tamage neravu dorakitendu avarannu tam'ma devaragisikondiddare
avaru ivarige neravagalu saktaralla. Adaru, ivaru avara munde dandugalante hajaraguttare
(dutare,) avara matugalinda nivu duhkhitaragabedi. Avaru bacciduva hagu prakata padisuva ellavannu navu ballevu
manusyanu kandillave, navu avanannu viryadinda srstisiruvudannu? Istagiyu avanu spasta jagalagantanagi bittiruvanu
Avanu nam'ma kuritu (eneno) holikegalannu kattuttane. Nijavagi avanu tanna jananavannu maretiddane. Elubugalu karagi hoda balika avugalannu yaru tane jivantagolisaballaru? Endu avanu prasnisuttane
heliri; avugalannu modala bari srstisidavane avugalannu matte srstisuvanu. Avanu ella bageya srsti karyavannu ballavanagiddane
avane, nimagagi hasiru maradinda benkiyannu utpadisidavanu, niviga adarindale benkiyannu urisuttiri
akasagalannu hagu bhumiyannu srstisidavanu ivaranthavarannu srstisalu asamarthane? Khandita alla. Avanantu, ellavannu balla, tajna srstikartanagiddane
avanu enannadaru madalu icchisidaga, adakke ‘agu’ endaste heluttane mattu astaralle adu agi bittiruttade
avanu pavananu, ella vastugala paramadhikaravu avana kaiyallide. (Konege) nim'mellarannu avanedege maralisalaguvudu
sistu bad'dhavagi salugattiruvavara (malak‌gala) ane
ugravagi gadarisuvavarane
upadesavannu oduvavarane
nim'ma aradhyanu khandita obbane
avanu akasagala, bhumiya hagu avugala naduve iruva ellavugala odeya mattu purvagala odeyanagiddane
khanditavagiyu navu bhulokada akasavannu naksatragala sobagininda alankarisiruvevu
mattu navu adannu pratiyobba vidrohi saitananinda raksisittiruvevu
melina lokada enannu kelisikollalu avarige sadhyavilla. Ella kadeyindalu avara mele praharavaguttade
avarannu bennatti him'mettisalaguttade. Allade avarige sasvata sikse ide
istagiyu kittukondu odidavanu – ondu uriyuva jvaleyu avana bennu hidiyuttade
nivu avarodane keli nodiri; avarannu srstisuvudu heccu kastavo athava nam'ma (itara) srstigalanno? Avarannantu navu antuva mannininda srstisiruvevu
(Dutare,) nivu (allahana mahimeya kuritu) accari paduttiri mattu avaru geli maduttare
avarige upadesisaladaga avaru upadesavannu svikarisuvudilla
avaru yavudadaru puraveyannu kandaga, adannu geli maduttare
mattu avaru, idu spastavada jadugarikeye horatu berenu alla endu biduttare
navu sattu mannagiyu elubugalagiyu marpatta balika nam'mannenu punah jivanta golisalaguvude
athava, nam'ma tata muttatandirannu kuda (jivantagolisalaguvude? Endu avaru prasnisuttare)
heliri, haudu, mattu nivu apamanitaraguviri
adu (lokantyada kahale) kevala ondu eccarikeya dhvaniyagiruvudu. Astaralle avaru dangagi noda todaguvaru
mattu avaru, ‘‘ayyo nam'ma dusthiti! Iduve a pratiphalada dina’’ ennuvaru
iduve, nivu nirakarisuttidda tirmanada dina
(andu malak‌galodane helalaguvudu;) ‘‘akramigalannu, avara jotegararannu mattu avaru (allahana horatu) yarannella aradhisuttiddaro avarannella ottu serisiri‘‘ –
‘‘ – allahana horatu. Mattu nivu avarige narakada dari torisiri
mattu avarannu tadeyiri. Khanditavagiyu avara vicarane nadeyabekagide
nimagenagide? Niveke paraspara neravaguttilla
nijavagi, indu avaru sampurna saranagi bittiddare
(andu) avaralli kelavaru matte kelavaredege tirugi prasnegalannu keluvaru
(avaru tam'ma nayakarodane) ‘‘nivu bala bhagadinda nam'ma balige baruttiddiri (satyadinda nam'mannu tadeyuttiddiri)’’ ennuvaru
avaru (nayakaru) heluvaru; ‘‘nijavagi, nivu satyavannu nambuvavare agiralilla’’
‘‘nim'ma mele namage adhikaravenu iralilla. Nijavagi nive vidrohi pangadavagiddiri’’
‘‘idiga nam'ma kuritu nam'ma odeyana matu satyavagi bittide. Naviga (sikseyannu) khandita saviyaliddeve’’
‘‘Navu nim'mannu darigedisiddu matravalla, svatah nave darigettiddevu’’
konege, avarellaru joteyagiye sikse anubhavisuvaru
navu aparadhigalige higeye madutteve
allahana horatu beraru pujar'haralla endu avarodane helaladaga avaru ahankara toriddaru
mattu ‘‘navenu obba huccu pidita kavigagi nam'ma devarugalannu bittu bidabeke?’’ Endu avaru keeluttiddaru
nijavagi avaru (devadutaru), satyadondige bandiruttare mattu avaru (hindina) devadutarugalannu samarthisuttare
nivu khandita yatanamaya sikseyannu saviyuviri
mattu nimage nivesaguttidda karmagala phalavaste sigalide
allahana ayda dasara horatu
avarigagi nirdista aharavide
hannugalu ive mattu avaru gauravanvitaragiruvaru
kodugegalu tumbiruva svarga totagalalli
eduru badiragiruva asanagalalli
hariyuva cilumegala paniyagalannu avara sutta oyyalaguvudu
avu subhravagiddu, kudiyuvavarige rucikaravagiruvavu
adarinda, yavude sankatavagadu mattu avaru mada mattaragalararu
avara bali drsti taggisiruva, visala kanninavaru (sevakiyaru) iruvaru
avaru, adagisitta mottegalante (subhra hagu nirmalaragi) iruvaru
avaru (svargavasigalu) eduru baduragi paraspararodane vicarisuvaru
avarallobbanu heluvanu; nanagobba sangati iddanu
avanu nannodane heluttiddanu; ‘‘ninenu (paralokavannu) nambuvavanagiruveya?’’
‘‘Navu sattu kevala mannu hagu elubugalagi bitta balika namage pratiphala sigalikkideye?’’
Avanu (matte) ‘‘niviga (ata elliddanendu) inuki nodalu bayasuttira?’’ Endu keluvanu
taruvaya avanu (svatah) inuki noduvanu hagu tanna sangatiyannu narakada madhyadalli kanuvanu
mattu avanu heluvanu; ‘‘allahanane! Ninantu nannannu nasa madiye biduttidde’’
Nanna odeyana anugrahavillade hogiddare, nanu (bandhigalagi) hajarugolisaladavara salige seriruttidde
(svargavasigalu heluvaru;) innu namagenu maranavillave
– nam'ma prathama maranada horatu? Mattu navu siksegu guriyagalarevu
khanditavagiyu iduve maha saubhagyavagide
sramisuvavarella idakkagiye sramisabeku
i atithya uttamavo athava ‘jhakkum’ maravo
khanditavagiyu navu adannu akramigala palige parikseyagisiruvevu
adu narakada taladinda beleyuva mara
adara gellugalu saitanara talegalantiruvavu
avaru (narakavasigalu) khandita adanne tinnuvaru mattu adarindale tam'ma hotte tumbuvaru
hageye, alli avarigagi malin'ya bereta, kudiyuttiruva paniyaviruvudu
konege, narakave avaru maraluva neleyagiruvudu
avaru, tam'ma purvajaru darigettiddannu kandiddaru
adaru, avaru avara hejje gurutugalanne anusarisidaru
nijavagi, avariginta hindina, avara purvajaralli heccinavaru darigettiddaru
navu avara naduve dutarannu kalisiddevu
hige eccarike padedavara gati enayitembudannu nodiri
allahana ayda dasara sthiti matra bhinnavagide
nuharu namage more ittaru. Navu (moregalige) atyuttama uttara niduvavaragiddeve
navu avarannu avara maneyavarannu maha vipattininda raksisidevu
mattu navu avara santatiyannu bahukala ulisidevu
mattu navu mundinavaralli avara nenapannu sanraksisidevu
nuharige santi, sarvalokagalalli
khanditavagiyu navu ide riti satkarmigalannu puraskarisutteve
avaru khandita nam'ma visvasi dasaragiddaru
taruvaya navu itararannu mulugisi bittevu
innu, ibrahimarantu avara (nuhara) hadiyalle nadeyuvavaragiddaru
avaru nirmala manas'sinondige tam'ma odeyana sannidhige bandaru
Mattu avaru tam'ma tande hagu tam'ma janangadavarodane kelidaru; ‘‘nivu adenannu pujisuttiruviri?’’
‘‘Nivenu, allahana jote mithya saktigalannu devaragisalu bayasuvira?’’
‘‘Ella lokagala odeyana kuritu nim'ma abhiprayavenu?’’
A balika avaru naksatragaledege drsti biridaru
mattu nanu asvasthanagi bittiddene endaru
avarella (janangadavarella) avarannu (ibrahimarannu) bittu horatu hodaru
avaru (ibrahimaru) avara (tam'ma janangadavara) devarugaledege (vigrahagaledege) gamana harisidaru mattu kelidaru; ‘‘nivu enannu tinnuvudillave?’’
‘‘Nimagenagide? Niveke matanaduttilla?’’
Konege avaru avugala mele mugibiddu balavagi hodedaru
avarella (janangadavarella) avaredege dhavisi bandaru
avaru (ibrahimaru helidaru;) ‘‘nivenu, svatah nive ketti nirmisidavugalannu pujisuttira?’’
‘‘Nim'mannu mattu nivu racisuvavugalannella allahane srstisiruvanu’’
avaru (janangadavaru, paraspararodane) ‘‘avanigagi ondu agni kundavannu racisiri mattu avanannu benkigesedu bidiri’’ endaru
avaru (janangadavaru), avarige hani mada bayasiddaru. Adare navu avarannu kilagisibittevu
avaru (ibrahim) helidaru; nanu nanna odeyanedege teraluttene. Avanu nanage saridariyannu torabahudu
‘‘nannodeya, nanage srestha santatigalannu daya palisu’’ (endu avaru prarthisidaru)
konege navu avarige obba vivekavanta putrana (isma'ilara) subhavarte nididevu

Avaru (isma'ilaru) avara jote odadaballavaradaga avaru helidaru; ‘‘nanu ninna koralu koyyuttiruvudagi svapnadalli kandiddene. I kuritu ninna anisike enu?’’ Avaru (isma'il) helidaru; ‘‘appa, nimage adesisalagiruvudannu nivu madibidi. Allahanicchisidare, nivu nannannu sahanasilanagi kanuviri’’
hige avaribbaru vidheyate toridaru mattu avaru (ibrahimaru) avarannu (putranannu), mukha kelagagisi malagisidaru
aga navu avarannu karedevu; ‘‘ibrahimare,’’
‘‘nivu svapnavannu sakaragolisidiri’’. Navu sajjanarannu khandita ide riti puraskarisutteve
adu khandita ondu spasta parikseyagittu
navu avarige (balidanakkagi) ondu maha balipasuvannu nididevu
mattu navu adara (a ghataneya) nenapannu mundinavaralli ulisidevu
ibrahimarige santi
navu sajjanarannu ide riti puraskarisutteve
avaru nam'ma visvasi dasarallobbaragiddaru
munde navu avarige is‌hak‌ra subha varteyannu nididevu. Avarobba sajjana devadutaragiddaru
navu avarigu is‌hakarigu samrd'dhiyannu nididevu. Avaribbara santatigalalli sajjanaru iddaru, svatah tam'ma mele spasta akramavesagidavaru iddare
navu musa mattu harunara mele krpe toridevu
mattu navu avaribbarannu avara janangadavarannu maha sankatadinda vimocisidevu
navu avarige neravadevu. Addarinda avaru vijayigaladaru
navu avaribbarigu savistaravada granthavannu nididdevu
mattu navu avarige nera margavannu torisiddevu
mundinavaralli navu avara nenapannu ulisidevu
musa mattu harunarige santi sigali
navu sajjanarannu khandita ideriti puraskarisutteve
avaribbaru nam'ma visvasi dasaragiddaru
mattu ilyas khandita devadutarallobbaragiddaru
Avaru tam'ma janangadavarodane helidaru; ‘‘nivenu (allahanige) anjuvudillave?’’
‘‘Nivenu ‘ba'al‌’ devige more iduttira? Mattu sarva srestha srstikartanannu bittu biduttira?’’
‘‘Allahane nim'ma odeyanu haudu nim'ma purvajara odeyanu haudu’’
avaru (janangadavaru) avarannu tiraskarisidaru. Avarannu khandita (siksegagi) hajaru padisalaguvudu
allahana ayda dasara horatu
avara (ilyasara) nenapannu navu mundinavaralli ulisiruvevu
ilyas‌rige santi sigali
navu khandita sajjanarannu ide riti puraskarisutteve
avaru khandita nam'ma visvasi dasarallobbaragiddaru
innu lutaru khandita nam'ma dutarallobbaragiddaru
navu avarannu hagu avara maneyavarannella raksisidevu
hinde ulidukonda obba vrd'dheya horatu
(avara janangada) itararannu navu nasa madibittevu
nivantu avara (nadugala) melindale hadu hoguttiri – hagalalli –
mattu irulalli. Nivenu alocisuvudillave
yunus khandita nam'ma dutarallobbaragiddaru
avaru tam'ma tumbida hadaginedege dhavisidaru
(hadagu muluguva hantadalli) avaru (adrstada) citi ettuvudakke oppidaru mattu sotu hodaru
konege (samudrakkeseyalada) avarannu minu nungitu. Aga avaru tam'manne dusisikondaru
ondu vele avaru allahana pavitravannu japisuttiruvavaragade iddiddare
punarut'thanada dinadavaregu avaru adara (minina) hotteyalle uliyuttiddaru
konege navu avarannu bayalige esedu bittevu. Aga avaru tumba ksinaragiddaru
navu avara bali balligaliruva gidavannu belesidevu
mattu navu avarannu ondu laksa athava adakkinta heccu janariddallige kalisidevu
avaru (a nadinavaru) nambidaru mattu ondu nirdista kalada tanaka navu avarige dharala sampannate nididevu
Idiga avarodane keliri. Nim'ma odeyanige putriyaru mattu avarige putrare
navenu malak‌galannu striyaragi srstisiruveve? Adakkenu avaru saksigalagiddare
nimage tilidirali. Avaru khandita tave racisikonda sullugalannu heluttiddare
allahanige santatigaliddarendu (avaru heluttare). Avaru khandita sullu heluttiddare
avanenu putrariginta putriyarige prasastya nididane
nimagenagide? Nivu adentaha tirmanagalannu kaigolluttiri
nivu patha kaliyuvudillave
athava nim'ma bali spasta puraveyenadaru ideye
nivu satyavantaragiddare tanniri, nim'ma granthavannu
avaru avana (allahana) hagu jinn‌gala naduve sambandha kalpisuttare. Tam'mannu (narakadeduru) hajarugolisalaguvudendu (dhikkari) jinn‌galige khandita tilidide
allahanu avara ella aropagalinda muktanagiddane
allahanu aydukonda dasaru matra bhinnaragiruttare
khanditavagiyu nivu mattu nivu pujisuva vastugalu –
avana (allahana) visayadalli yarannu mosagolisuvantilla –
narakakke hoguvavanendu vidhisalpattavana horatu
(malak‌galu heluttare:) ‘‘Nam'malli pratiyobbarigu ondu sthanavu niscitavagide
mattu navu (allahana mande) salugatti nintirutteve
mattu navu khandita (allahana) pavitravannu japisuttirutteve‘‘
i hinde avaru (dhikkarigalu) heluttiddaru
‘‘nam'ma bali gata kaladavara bodhanegalu (divya grantha) iddiddare
navu khandita ayda dasara salige seriruttiddevu’’
adare (divya granthavu bandaga) avaru adannu dhikkarisidaru. Idiga adara parinamavu avarige tiliyalide
dutaragiruva nam'ma dasara visayadalli nam'ma helikeyu igagale vidhitavagide
(adenendare), avarige khandita sahaya sigalide
Mattu khanditavagiyu nam'ma padegale gelluvavu
(dutare,) sadya, ondu nirdista kalada tanaka nivu avarannu (dhikkarigalannu) kadeganisiri
mattu nivu avarannu noduttaliri. Avaru sighrave (tam'ma gatiyannu) kanuvaru
avarenu, nam'ma siksegagi atura paduttiddareye
adu avara angalakke bandilidaga, igagale eccarisalpattavara palige adu bahala ketta munjaneyagiruvudu
sadya, ondu nirdista kalada tanaka nivu avarannu kadeganisiri
mattu nivu avarannu noduttaliri. Avaru sighrave (tam'ma gatiyannu) kanuvaru
nim'ma pavana (gauravanvita) odeyanu, avaru horisuva ella aropagalinda sampurna muktanagiddane
dutarige santi sigali
mattu ella prasansegalu sarvalokagala odeyanada allahanige misalu
svad. Upadesa tumbiruva kur‌aninane
nijavagi dhikkarigalu ahankara hagu hathamaritanadalliddare
avariginta hinde navu adesto janangagalannu nasa madiruvevu. Avaru gogaredaru. Adare, avara bidugadege kalavadhi ulidiralilla
avara paikiye obbanu eccarisuvavanagi avara balige banda kuritu avaru accaripattaru mattu dhikkarigalu helidaru; ‘‘avanu sullu heluttiruva obba matagaranagiddane’’
‘‘avanu ella devarugalannu obba devaragisi bittiddane. Idu khandita vicitravagide’’
avara kelavu nayakaru horatu hogutta helidaru; ‘‘horadiri mattu nim'ma devarugalige nistharagiri. Adara (satya sandesada) hinde khandita eno svarthavide’’
‘‘navu gatakalada dharmadalli antahadenannu kelilla. Adu khandita (avana) svanta racaneyagide’’
‘‘upadesavannu nam'ma naduve ivanige ilisikodalagideye?’’ Nijavagi avaru nanna upadesada kuritu sansayadalliddare. Avarinnu sikseya ruciyannu kandilla
prabalanu udariyu agiruva nim'ma odeyana anugrahada bhandaragalenu avara bali iveye
Akasagala hagu bhumiya mattu avugala naduve iruva ellavugala sarvadhikaravenu avarige serideye? Hagadare avaru enigalanneri hattinodali
avarondu sota seneyagiddare
avariginta hindinavaru tiraskarisiddaru. Nuhara janangadavaru, ad (janangadavaru) hagu moleyavanada phir‌aun‌na janaru
hageye samudaru hagu lut‌ra janangadavaru mattu aikahdavaru. Avarella (satyavirodhi) padegalagiddaru. Avarellaru dutarugalannu tiraskarisidaru. Konege, avara mele nanna sikseyu banderagitu
avaru kayuttiruva ghataneyu, kevala ondu arbhatavagiruvudu. Abalika yava riyaytiyu sigadu
avaru (vyangyavagi) helidaru; nam'modeya, namage nam'ma palannu vicaraneya dinakkinta modale turtagi kottubidu
(dutare,) avaru aduva matugala kuritu nivu sahanasilaragiri mattu nam'ma saktisali dasaragidda davudarannu smarisiri. Avaru khandita pade pade (allahanedege) maraluvavaragiddaru
navu avara jotege parvatagalannu vidheyagolisiddevu. Avu sanje hagu munjane (allahana) pavitravannu japisuttiddavu
hageye, paksigalu avara bali bandu seruttiddavu. Avellavu avaredege maraluttiddavu
navu avara samrajyavannu balisthagolisiddevu mattu avarige yuktiyannu hagu nirnayaka tirpu niduva samarthyavannu nididdevu
a jagala niratara vrttantavu nimage talupideye? Avaru gode hari masidiyolage bandu bittiddaru

avaru hathattane davudara balige bandaga avaru becci biddaru. Avaru helidaru; anjabedi, navu eradu jagala nirata gumpugalu. Nam'malli ondu gumpu innondara mele an'yayavesagide. Niviga nam'ma naduve n'yayocitavagi tirpu nidiri mattu atirekavesagabedi. Sariyada margadedege nivu namage margadarsana madiri
Ivanu nanna sahodara. Ivana bali tombhattombattu kurigalive mattu nanna bali ondu kuri matra ide. Avaniga ‘‘adannu nanage kottu bidu’’ ennuttiddane mattu matinalli avanu nannannu solisiddane

avaru (davudaru) helidaru; ‘‘ninna kuriyannu tanna kurigala rasige serisalu agrahisuva mulaka avanu khandita ninna mele akramavesagiruvanu. Khanditavagiyu, jotegudi badukuvavaralli heccinavaru paraspara an'yayavesaguttare – visvasigalu mattu satkarmigala horatu. Mattu anthavaru tumba kadime‘‘. (I mulaka) navu tam'mannu pariksisidevembudannu davudaru managandaru mattu avaru tam'ma odeyana munde ksameyacisutta, avanige saranagi, bagutta sastangaveragi bittaru
konege navu avarigagi adannu (avara pramadavannu) ksamisi bittevu mattu avarigagi nam'ma bali samipya hagu srestha phalitansavide

davudare, navu khandita nim'mannu bhumiyalli (nam'ma) pratinidhiyagisiruvevu. Nivu janara naduve n'yayocitavagi tirmana kaigolliri mattu sveccheyannu anusarisabedi. Adu nim'mannu allahana margadinda duragolisi biduvudu. Allahana margadinda dura saridu bittavarige, avaru vicaraneya dinavannu maretudakkagi khandita, tivra sikse ide
navu akasavannagali, bhumiyannagali averadara naduve iruva yavudanne agali vyarthavagi srstisilla. Adu kevala dhikkarigala bhrameyagide. Dhikkarigalige vinasavide, agniya mulaka
navenu, visvasigalagiddu satkarmagalannu maduttiddavarannu, bhumiyalli asanti habbuvavarante maduveve? Navenu dharma nistharannu duskarmigalante maduveve
navu nim'medege ondu samrd'dha granthavannu ilisiruvevu, janaru adara vacanagala kuritu cintane nadesalendu mattu bud'dhi ullavaru patha kaliyalendu
Mattu navu davudarige sulaimanarannu dayapalisidevu. Avarobba srestha dasaragiddaru. Avaru khandita pade pade (allahanedege) maraluvavaragiddaru
ondu sanje bhari balistha kuduregalannu avara munde hajaru padisalayitu
avaru helidaru; ‘‘nanu nanna odeyana nenapiginta, sampattina premakke heccina prasastya nidibittenu. Estendare (vastavavu) tereya marege saridu bittitu’’
‘‘avugalannu (a kuduregalannu) matte nanna munde tanniri’’. A balika avaru avugala padagalannu hagu koralugalannu nevarisidaru
mattu navu sulaimanarannu pariksisidevu hagu avara sinhasanada mele ondu sariravannu haki bittevu. A balika avaru (allahana balige) maralidaru
avaru helidaru; ‘‘nannodeya, nannannu ksamisu mattu nanna balika yarigu sigadantaha samrajyavannu nanage nidu. Ninu khandita udariyagiruve’’
hige navu galiyannu avarige vidheyagolisidevu. Adu avara adesadante, avaru bayasuvallige nidhanavagi calisuttittu
kattadagalannu kattuva hagu nirina alakkiliyuva saitanarannu (vidrohi jinn‌galannu)
mattu sarapanigalalli bandhitavagidda itara kelavu jivigalannu (avarige vidheyagolisalagittu)
idu nam'ma koduge. (Idarinda) itararige kodiri athava enike madade nive ittu kolliri
avarigagi khandita nam'ma bali samipya hagu srestha phalitansavide
nivu nam'ma dasa ayyubarannu smarisiri. Avaru tam'ma odeyanige more ittaru; ‘‘saitananu nannannu sankatakkidu madiddane mattu nannannu tumba hinsisiddane’’
navu helidevu; ‘‘nivu kalininda (nelakke) odeyiri. Ido, snanakke hagu kudiyuvudakke, hitavada tanniru’’
Navu avarige, avara maneyavarige hagu avara jotegidda avarantaha itararige nam'ma kadeyinda anugrahavannu dayapalisidevu. Bud'dhi yullavarige adaralli upadesavide

‘‘nivu porakeyannu kaigettikondu hodeyiri. Mattu nivu nim'ma pratijneyannu muriyabedi’’ (endu navu helidevu). Navu avarannu sahanasilaragi kandevu. Avaru srestha dasaragiddaru mattu avaru khandita maraluvavaragiddaru
nam'ma dasarada ibrahimarannu, is‌hakarannu mattu ya'akub‌rannu smarisiri. Avaru saktivantaru duradrsti ullavaru agiddaru
navu avaralli ondu visesa gunavannu maigudisiddevu – paralokada smarane (emba guna)
nam'ma bali avaru, ayda, atyuttama vyaktigalagiddaru
nivu isma'il‌rannu al‌yasa'arannu hagu jhul‌kiphl‌rannu smarisiri. Avarellaru atyuttamaragiddaru
idu ondu upadesavagide. Dharmanistharige khandita, atyuttama nele sigalide
sasvatavada udyanagala bagilugalu avarigagi terediruvavu
avaru avugalalli dimbugalige oragikondiruvaru. Dharala hannu hampalugalannu hagu paniyagalannu tarisuvaru
sada drsti taggisikondiruva (manavanta) sahavayaska striyaru avara jotegiruvaru
ivu vicaraneya dinada kuritante nimage nidalaguttiruva asvasanegalu
ivu khandita kodugegalagive. Ivugalige antyavilla
idu (sajjanara pratiphala). Atta, vidrohigalige atyanta nikrsta nele ide
avaru narakavannu pravesisuvaru. Adu tira ketta nele
idu (avara gati). Saviyiri kudiyuva nirannu hagu tira kolaku dravyavannu
mattu alli, ide tarada innu aneka vastugaliruvavu
ido i gumpu nim'ma jote narakakke nusuluttide. Avarannu svagatisuvavaru yaru illa. Avaru khandita narakagniyalli suttu hoguvaru
Avaru (tamaginta modalu bandavarodane) heluvaru; nimagu illi svagatavenilla. Nive nam'mannu illige munnadesidavaru. Bahala ketta nele idu
avaru heluvaru; nam'modeya, nam'mannu illige munnadesidavarige narakadallina sikseyannu heccisi duppattugolisibidu
mattu avaru heluvaru; namage idenagide? Dustarendu navu pariganisidda janaru (illi) namage kanisuttillavalla
navu avarannu geli maduttiddevu. (Nam'ma) kannugalenu avarannu kanalu asamarthavagiveye
khanditavagiyu idu satya. Narakadavaru (higeye) jagaladuvaru
(dutare,) heliri; nanu kevala eccarisuvavanu. Eka matranu balisthanu agiruva allahana horatu bere devarilla
avanu akasagala, bhumiya hagu avugala naduve iruva ellavugala odeyanu, bhari pracandanu maha ksamasilanu agiruvanu
heliri; idondu dodda (mahatvada) suddi
adare, nivu idannu kadeganisuttiruviri
melina lokadalli avaru jagaladida kuritu nanage yava mahitiyu iralilla
idella nanage nidalagiruva divya sandesavagide. Nanu spastavagi eccarisuvavanu matra
nim'modeyanu malak‌galodane helidanu; ‘‘nanu mannininda obba manavanannu srstisaliddene’’
‘‘nanu atanannu racisi avanolage nanna atmadinda udidaga nivu avanige sastangaveragiri’’
malak‌galellaru joteyagi sastangaveragidaru
adare iblisana horatu. Avanu ahankara toridanu mattu avanu dhikkariyagiddanu
avanu (allahanu) helidanu; iblisane, nanu nanna kaiyyare srstisi davana munde sastangaveragadante ninnannu tadeda ansa yavudu? Ninu ahankara torideya? Athava ninenu tumba unnata sthanadavane
avanu(saitananu) helidanu; nanu avaniginta (manavaniginta) sresthanu. Ninu nannannu benkiyinda srstisiruve mattu avanannu ninu mannininda srstisiruve
Avanu (allahanu) helidanu; ninu illinda tolagu. Ninu nindyanagiruve
khanditavagiyu antima pratiphalada dinadavaregu ninna mele nanna sapaviruvudu
avanu (saitananu) helidanu; nannodeya ellarannu matte jivantagolisuva dinada tanaka nanage kalavakasa nidu
avanu (allahanu) helidanu; sari, ninage avakasa nidalagide
ondu nirdista kalada tanaka
avanu (saitan) helidanu; ninna gauravadane! Nanu avarellarannu darigedisi biduvenu
avara paiki ninu arisikonda dasara horatu
avanu (allahanu) helidanu; idu satya, mattu nanu satyavanne heluttene
nanu narakavannu ninninda hagu avara paiki ninnannu anusarisuvavarinda tumbi bidaliddene
(dutare,) heliri; nanu idakkagi (satya prasarakkagi) nim'minda yavude pratiphalavannu bayasuvudilla mattu nanu vancakanalla
idu (kur‌an) sarva lokagaligiruva upadesavagide
idara vastavavu tusukalada balika nimage khandita tiliyalide
(idu) prabalanu yuktivantanu agiruva allahana kadeyinda ilisi kodalagiruva grantha
(dutare,) khanditavagiyu navu idannu satyadondige nim'medege ilisikottirutteve. Nivinnu nistheyannu avanige misalagittu, avanannu aradhisiri

nenapirali, nistheyu allahanige misalagirali. Allahana horatu itararannu tam'ma posakaragisikondavaru, ‘‘avaru nam'mannu allahanige nikatagolisuvarendu matra navu avarannu pujisutteve’’ ennuttare. Avaru bhinnate taliruva visayagalalli allahane avara naduve tirmana maduvanu. Sullugaranagiruva krtaghnanige allahanu khandita sari dariyannu toruvudilla

Allahanu yarannadaru tanna putranagisikollalu bayasiddare, avanu tanna srstigala paiki tanicchisidavarannu arisikolluttiddanu. Avanu pavananu. A allahanu, anupamanagiddane hagu bhari saktisaliyagiddane

avanu akasagalannu hagu bhumiyannu kramabad'dhavagi srstisiruvanu. Avane ratriyannu hagala mele avarisuttane hagu hagalannu ratriya mele avarisuttane mattu surya hagu candranannu vidheyagolisiddane. Ellavu ondu nirdista avadhigagi calaneyallide. Nenapirali, avanu pracandanu maha ksamasilanu agiddane

avanu nim'mannu ondu jivadinda srstisidanu hagu adarinda adara jodiyannu srstisidanu mattu januvarugalalli nimagagi entu jodigalannu tayarisidanu. Avanu nim'mannu nim'ma tayandira garbhagalalli, muru kattalugalalli, hanta hantavagi srstisiruvanu. A allahane nim'ma odeyanu. Adhikaravellavu avanige seride. Avana horatu bere devarilla. Nivu adelli aleyuttiruviri

nivu krtaghnate toridare, allahanantu nim'ma agatyave illadavanagiddane. Adare avanu tanna dasara palige krtaghnateya niluvannu meccuvudilla. Nivu krtajnate toruvudadare adanne avanu nim'ma palige meccuttane. Hore horuva yaru innobbara horeyannu horalaranu. Konegom'me nivu nim'ma odeyana balige marali hoguviri mattu avanu, nivu enella maduttiddirembudannu nimage tilisuvanu. Khanditavagiyu avanu manas'sinolagina vicaragalannu ballavanagiddane

Mattu manavanige sankatavenadaru tattidare, avanu tannodeyanedege olidu, avanige more iduttane. Taruvaya avanu (allahanu) atanige tanna anugrahavannu daya palisidaga, atanu i hinde tanu yarige more ittiddenembudanne maretu biduttane mattu allahanige paludararannu nemisuttane – avaru atanannu avana (allahana) dariyinda duragolisi biduttare. (Anthavanige) heliri; tusukala ninu ninna krtaghnateya sukhavannu anubhavisu. Ninu khandita narakavasiyagiruve

(avanu sresthano, athava) ratriya vele sastangaveragikondu, nintukondu aradhisutta, paralokada kuritu sada jagrtanagiddu, tanna odeyana anugrahavannu niriksisuttiruvavanu sresthano? Heliri; aritilladavaru mattu aritiruvavaru samanaragaballare? Bud'dhiyullavaru matra upadesavannu svikarisuttare
heliri; nanna (allahana) visvasi dasare, nim'ma odeyanige anjiri. I lokadalli olitannu madidavarige, olitu sigalide. Allahana bhumiyu visalavagide. Sahanasilarige apara pratiphala sigalide
heliri; nanagantu, nistheyannu allahanige misalagittu, avanannu aradhisalu adesisalagide
mattu nane prathamavagi muslima (saranagata)nagabekendu nanage adesisalagide
heliri; nanu nanna odeyana adesavannu miri nadedare ondu maha dinada siksege tuttaguva bhaya nanagide
heliri; nanu nanna nistheyannu allahanige misalagittu avananne aradhisuttene

nivu avana horatu yarannu bekadaru aradhisiri. Heliri; tam'mannu hagu tam'ma maneyavarannu punarut'thana dina nastakkolapadisikondavare nijavagi nasta anubhavisuvavaragiddare. (Nimage) tilidirali; aduve spastavada nasta

Avarigagi (narakadalli), avara melu avarannu avarisuva benkiya jvalegaliruvavu mattu avara kelagu avarannu avarisuva jvalegaliruvavu. Allahanu a kuritu tanna dasarannu eccarisuttane. Nanna dasare, nanage anjiri
avana aradhanegagi, mithya saktigalannella toredu allahanedege olavu toridavarige subhavarte ide. Antaha nanna bhaktarige subhavarte nidiri
avaru matannu sariyagi alisi, adara atyuttama ayamavannu anusarisuttare. Avare allahaninda margadarsana padedavaru mattu avare bud'dhivantaru
igagale sikseya tirpu vidhisalpattavanannu mattu igagale benkige biddu bittiruvavanannu nivu raksisaballira

adare, tam'ma odeyana bhaktaragiddavarigagi, maligegalu mattu avugala mele mattastu sid'dha maligegalu iruvavu. Avugala taladalli hariyuva nadigaliruvavu. Idu allahana vagdana. Allahanendu tanu kotta matannu miruvudilla

nivu kanalillave? Allahanu akasadinda nirannu surisi, adannu cilumegalagisi bhumiyalli harisuttane. Taruvaya avanu allinda vividha bannada belegalannu horategeyuttane. A balika adu onagi biduttade mattu adu haladiyaguvudannu nivu kanuttiri. A balika avanu adannu curu curagisi biduttane. Idaralli bud'dhivantarige khandita pathavide

allahanu yara hrdayavannu islamigagi teredu bittano, avanu tanna odeyana kadeyinda belakinalliddane. Allahanannu nenapisalagadastu hrdayavu kathinavagi bittavarige vinasa kadide. Avaru spastavagi darigetta sthitiyalliddare

Allahanu, samarupada, avartita vacanagaliruva atyuttama granthavannu ilisikottiddane. Tam'ma odeyana bhakti ullavarige adarinda romancanavaguttade. Taruvaya avara carmagalu (bahyavu) hrdayagalu (antarangavu)allahana nenapinedege vali biduttave. Idu allahana margadarsana. Avanu tanicchisidavarige saridariyannu toruttane. Innu allahane dari tappisidavanige sari dari toraballavaru yaru illa

punarut'thana dina, tanna mukhavannu a ketta sikseyinda raksisalu henaguttiruvavanu (svargavasigalige samananagaballane)? Andu akramigalodane ‘‘saviyiri, nivu maduttidda karmagala phalavannu’’ ennalaguvudu
avariginta hindinavaru (satyavannu) tiraskarisiddaru. Konege avarige arive illadante, avara mele sikseyu banderagitu
allahanu i lokada badukinalle avarige nastada ruciyannu unisidanu. Innu paralokada sikseyantu idakkinta tumba doddadagiruvudu. Avaru idannu aritirabekittu
khanditavagiyu navu i kur‌an‌nalli manavarigagi ella bageya udaharanegalannu mundittiruvevu – avaru upadesavannu svikarisabekendu
arabi bhaseyalliruva, yava vakrateyu illada kur‌an. Avaru dharmanistharagabekendu (idannu kaluhisalagide)

allahanu ondu udaharaneyannu mundiduttane: Obbanu parasparara palige tira hathamarigalagiruva halavara dasanagiddane mattu innobbanu kevala obbana dasanagiddane. Avaribbara sthitiyu samanavagiralu sadhyave? Allahanige stutigalu. Adare, heccinavaru aritilla
(dutare,) nivu khandita sayuviri mattu avaru (virodhigalu) khandita sayuvaru
mattu nivu (virodhigalu) punarut'thanadina nim'ma odeyana munde khandita paraspara jagaladuviri. Kanda –
Allahana mele sullaropa horisida hagu satyavu tanna balige bandaga adannu tiraskarisidavaniginta dodda akrami yaru? Dhikkarigala nele iruvudu narakadalle tane
satyavannu tandavanu mattu adannu samarthisidavanu – avare dharmanistharu
